successes.title: RigidBot 3D Printer
successes.description: A sturdy, customizable 3D printer that is easy to use and affordable for all. 3D print almost any object. There are no limits!

Pledges.description: Get a 3D printed RigidBot Keychain and a Big Thank you!
Get a cool RigidBot T-Shirt and a Big Thank you!

*Early Bird Special*
Complete RigidBot 10"x10"x10" PLA Kit.  Includes everything you need to make your 3D printer.  Includes 6' of PLA material.  Add $125 for LCD / SD card reader kit.  Add $50 for shipping in the USA or $90 for International Shipping

Come to Invent-A-Part, Inc and have a great dinner on us and meet the team.  Get a custom designed (any size - some limits apply) and assembled  RigidBot that is ready to print.  Shipping of your final printer is included. Travel and accommodations are not included.
